page.title: 10HOME LIFE
page.content: A TYPICAL ADULTS DAY I get up at 7.3Oam and then I make the breakfast which is toast and cereal for Julie and Joanne. They go to school at 8.4Oam and then I have a cup of coffee, make the beds and wash the dishes. I then do other jobs such as washing clothes or vacuuming the carpets. The girls come home for dinner which is usually egg and chips. They go back to school at 12.45. I do my shopping in Birtley but have to be back for Joanne who is five at 3.15pm. Julie arrives home at four; o'clock and we all have our tea. We usually have salad sandwiches and a glass of coke. I wash up and the girls go out to play. They come in at 8pm and go to bed. I wash the dishes tidy up and have a bath before going to bed at 9pm.
